document_data.name: Mazarka
document_data.mainbody: '''Shestandeliath Mazarka''' was a [[dragonborn]] member of [[Clan Shestandeliath]] in [[1487 DR]].
document_data.History:
In 1487 DR, Mazarka was a farmer in one of the Shestandeliath homesteads located near the [[Riders to the Sky]]. She was one of the survivors of the clan during the [[Second Sundering]] that was captured and enslaved by the returned [[Unther]]ans.

At some point, she was killed and impersonated by the [[lamia]] [[Zillah]].
